` *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Report YTBE_TEST_DS *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_ds_tutorial.
DATA o_ds TYPE REF TO ygplids_store. DATA o_ds2 TYPE REF TO ygplids_store. DATA s_str TYPE string. DATA s_str2 TYPE string. DATA o_dsx TYPE REF TO ygpl_ds_store.
START-OF-SELECTION. BREAK-POINT.
* Create a Store CREATE OBJECT o_dsx. o_ds = ygpl_ds_engine=>new_store( ).
* Add informations s_str = 'TEST'. o_ds->add_info( name = 'STR' value = s_str ). s_str = 'HAS Changed'. o_ds->get_info( EXPORTING name = 'STR' CHANGING value = s_str2 ). WRITE:/ s_str, s_str2.
WRITE:/ o_ds->id, o_ds->memory_size. * Save Store to Database o_ds->save( ). COMMIT WORK AND WAIT .
* Retrieve data with a new object with the same content o_ds2 = ygpl_ds_engine=>get_store( o_ds->id ). IF o_ds2 = o_ds. WRITE:/ 'KO'. ELSE. WRITE:/ 'OK'. ENDIF.
